Title: Day 5: 12:00 A.M. - 1:00 A.M.
Plot: Jack shows Heller the incriminating recording in the hopes that he will help them take down Logan, but Heller has plans of his own that will save face for the presidency. Miles tricks Chloe into leading CTU to Jack and Audrey. Mike and Martha both become more suspicious of Logan's actions, while Heller confronts the president with an ultimatum.
GuestStars: Mark Thompson,  Jason Grutter,  Larkin Campbell,  Ray Wise,  William Devane
